events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen has several scratches and the device seems faulty. I am quite disappointed with the quality.
The issue has been categorised under Product Defect based on the customer's description of scratches and faults on the laptop screen.
This case has been assigned to the technical support agent team to assist with the defective laptop issue.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and describe any other functional problems you are experiencing with the device?
I have attached photos of the scratches on the screen. Additionally, the laptop randomly shuts down without warning which makes it unusable.
Thank you for the information and photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement laptop, as I still want to use your product but only if it is free of defects.
We have processed the replacement order and it will be shipped to you within 3 business days. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that the replacement laptop arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
We are closing this case as resolved, but please reach out anytime if you experience further issues or need assistance.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on how we handled your product defect case.
